verbose_text: The VAMP3 result was somewhat unexpected, since an early study reported that TeTx impaired Tfn release from permeabilized CHO cells, which correlated with toxin mediated cleavage of VAMP3, while VAMP2 was below the detection limit in these cells by immunoblot analysis; both VAMP2 and VAMP3 are substrates for the TeTx metalloproteinase (see Discussion).
evidence: TeTx impaired Tfn release from permeabilized CHO cells, which correlated with toxin-mediated cleavage of VAMP3
